attributes.action: Labelling of unstunned halal & kosher meat
attributes.additional_details: Slaughter without pre-stunning inflicts unnecessary pain & distress on animals & has been banned in many other countries.The govt appointed  Farm Animal  Welfare Council, RSPCA, CIWF & other animal welfare charities believe that it should not be permitted. Whilst respecting the right to religious freedom , if this country chooses not to ban this method of slaughter then THE RESULTING MEAT SHOULD AT LEAST BE  APPROPRIATELY LABELLED TO GIVE THE CONSUMER CHOICE.
